```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
#attach packages
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
library(plotly)
library(lubridate)
library(kableExtra)
library(readxl)
library(remotes)

gdrive_data <- "G:/My Drive"

```

```{r}
#install github package
install_github("davidsjoberg/ggsankey")
```

```{r}
#read in data
sankey_data <- read_excel(here(gdrive_data, "/sankey_data.xlsx"))
```

```{r}
ggplot(sankey_data, aes(x = x, 
               next_x = next_x, 
               node = node, 
               next_node = next_node,
               fill = factor(node))) +
  geom_sankey()
```
